namespace.name: AmbientOS.Net
namespace.summary: Contains interfaces related to networking and connectivity.

interface.name: BluetoothLEScanner
interface.summary: A facility capable of receiving Bluetooth LE advertisments and exposing the discovered peripherals.

method.name: Scan
method.summary: Starts a scan for peripherals. The peripherals are added and removed to a dynamic set as they are discovered and lost. If the reference count of the dynamic set reaches 0, the scan is stopped. It is restarted if the set is referenced again.

method.name: Connect
method.summary: Establishes a connection with the peripheral.
